title: The Best 11 AI Monitor Tools in 2025
summary: Discover the power of AI Monitor tools, designed to enhance your data oversight and decision-making processes. These innovative solutions provide real-time insights, performance tracking, and predictive analytics, empowering you to stay ahead in a fast-paced digital landscape. Whether you're managing projects, monitoring social media, or analyzing market trends, AI Monitor tools streamline your workflow and improve efficiency. Explore our curated selection of cutting-edge tools today and unlock the potential of AI to transform your monitoring capabilities!

tools.name: Browse AI
tools.description: Browse AI is a no-code platform for automating web data extraction and monitoring from any website.

tools.name: Lakera
tools.description: Lakera is an AI security platform that protects generative AI applications from adversarial threats like prompt injections and ensures safe, compliant AI deployments.

tools.name: Astra AI
tools.description: Astra AI is a cutting-edge platform that harnesses artificial intelligence to provide advanced data analysis and business intelligence solutions.

tools.name: Arize
tools.description: Arize is a machine learning observability platform that helps teams monitor, troubleshoot, and improve AI models in production.

tools.name: Applitools
tools.description: Applitools provides AI-powered visual testing and monitoring solutions to ensure flawless digital experiences across web and mobile applications.

tools.name: SuperAGI
tools.description: SuperAGI is an open-source platform for building, managing, and running autonomous AI agents to automate complex tasks across various domains.

tools.name: Helicone
tools.description: Helicone is an open-source LLM observability platform that enables developers to monitor, debug, and optimize their AI applications efficiently.

tools.name: Omnara
tools.description: Omnara is a real-time command center for monitoring, managing, and collaborating with AI agents across terminal, web, and mobile platforms.

tools.name: Relyable
tools.description: Relyable is a simulation and monitoring platform for testing and evaluating AI voice agents to ensure high performance.

tools.name: RunAleph
tools.description: RunAleph is a platform designed for running and deploying AI models in a decentralized computing environment.

tools.name: Webhookify
tools.description: Webhookify is a user-friendly platform for creating, testing, and managing webhook endpoints without coding.
